:v-model.description: The v-model binds a variable with a Boolean value to control the keyboard popping up and closing
:v-model.description_zh: v-model绑定一个值为布尔值的变量控制键盘的弹出与收起

mode.description: For the type of keyboard, see the basic instructions above
mode.description_zh: 键盘类型，见上方基本使用的说明

dot-enabled.description: Whether to display "." button, only valid when mode=number
dot-enabled.description_zh: 是否显示"."按键，只在mode=number时有效

tooltip.description: Whether to display the toolbar at the top of the keyboard
tooltip.description_zh: 是否显示键盘顶部工具条

tips.description: For the prompt text in the middle of the toolbar, see the basic instructions above
tips.description_zh: 工具条中间的提示文字，见上方基本使用的说明

show-tips.description: Whether to display the text in the middle of the toolbar
show-tips.description_zh: 是否显示工具条中间的文字

cancel-btn.description: Whether to display the Cancel button on the left side of the toolbar
cancel-btn.description_zh: 是否显示工具条左边的"取消"按钮

confirm-btn.description: Whether to display the Done button on the right side of the toolbar
confirm-btn.description_zh: 是否显示工具条右边的"完成"按钮

mask.description: Whether or not to display a mask

z-index.description: The z-index value of the keyboard is displayed

random.description: Whether or not the order of keyboard keys is shuffled
random.description_zh: 是否打乱键盘按键的顺序

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

mask-close-able.description: Whether to allow clicking the mask to collapse the keyboard
mask-close-able.description_zh: 是否允许点击遮罩收起键盘

confirm-text.description: Confirm the text of the button

cancel-text.description: The text of the cancel button

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content will be displayed on the toolbar of the keyboard, which can be combined with the MessageInput verification code input component to achieve a function similar to Alipay when entering a password
slots.description_zh: 内容将会显示键盘的工具条上面，可以结合MessageInput 验证码输入组件实现类似支付宝输入密码时，上方显示输入内容的功能
